name: Pirate's Booty
description:
Ahoy, welcome to the greatest pirate adventure! Help Laffy, the young wannabe pirate, to go as far as possible in the Caribbean seas aboard his fast ship. Get as many doubloons, gems, and pirate treasures, and improve your ship in the buccaneer shop. Buy cannons to defend yourself, engines to increase the speed and hit points of the ship, and other upgrades that will help you reach great distances.

But, be careful! The Seven seas are a dangerous place, full of enemies, and obstacles! Avoid them, or shoot them with your cannon, and get as many Power Ups as possible, to make your trip easier!

Enjoy this colorful endless runner classic game, with beautiful anime graphics.
